short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides developers with insights on open source components listed on web pages they visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mend Advise provides developers with an informative snapshot preview of components to help guide them towards picking the right piece of code for their projects. 
It includes a helpful rating of components based on need to know details such as their security vulnerabilities, licenses, quality. 

Mend customers can identify whether an open source component is being used by other teams, and whether it complies with their organizationâ€™s policies for security and licenses earlier in the pipeline.
